title: AWS SageMaker to Azure ML: Machine Learning Exploratory Data Analysis and Statistical Modeling
description: Master machine learning exploratory data analysis by implementing statistical analysis, data visualization, and hypothesis testing using SageMaker and migrating to Azure ML equivalents with advanced analytics, feature analysis, and data insights for ML model development.
learningObjectives: Implement comprehensive exploratory data analysis using SageMaker Data Wrangler and Azure ML
Build statistical analysis and hypothesis testing workflows for ML datasets
Create advanced data visualization and interactive analytics dashboards
Design feature analysis and correlation studies for ML model development
Implement automated data profiling and statistical validation workflows
Build data storytelling and insights communication for ML stakeholders
prerequisites: Completion of MLA-C01 Data Engineering for ML Lab or equivalent ML data experience
Understanding of statistical concepts and data analysis methodologies
Basic knowledge of Python, pandas, matplotlib, seaborn, and statistical libraries
Familiarity with machine learning concepts and model development workflows
businessScenario: Analytics Innovations provides machine learning solutions for retail, healthcare, and financial services. Their data science team needs comprehensive exploratory data analysis capabilities to understand complex datasets, identify patterns, validate hypotheses, and guide ML model development. They must master statistical analysis and data visualization across AWS and Azure ML platforms to deliver actionable insights and build high-performing ML models.

sections.title: Statistical Analysis and Data Profiling
topics: Comprehensive statistical analysis and data profiling techniques
SageMaker Data Wrangler vs Azure ML statistical analysis workflows
Descriptive statistics, distributions, and outlier detection
Missing data analysis and imputation strategy recommendations
Statistical significance testing and hypothesis validation

tasks.title: Implement Comprehensive Statistical Analysis Framework
tasks.description: Build statistical analysis and data profiling with automated insights
steps: Configure SageMaker Data Wrangler for automated statistical profiling
Setup Azure ML Studio with equivalent statistical analysis capabilities
Implement descriptive statistics and distribution analysis workflows
Configure missing data analysis and imputation recommendations
Setup statistical significance testing and hypothesis validation
Create automated statistical reporting and insights generation
deliverables: SageMaker Data Wrangler statistical profiling configuration
Azure ML statistical analysis workflows and automation
Comprehensive data profiling and distribution analysis
Statistical significance testing and hypothesis validation framework

sections.title: Advanced Data Visualization and Interactive Analytics
topics: Advanced data visualization techniques for ML datasets
Interactive dashboards and exploratory data analysis interfaces
Multi-dimensional data visualization and dimensionality reduction
Time series analysis and temporal pattern visualization
Geospatial data analysis and visualization for ML applications

tasks.title: Build Advanced Data Visualization Platform
tasks.description: Create comprehensive visualization and interactive analytics capabilities
steps: Design advanced data visualization workflows with multiple chart types
Implement interactive dashboards for exploratory data analysis
Configure multi-dimensional visualization and dimensionality reduction
Setup time series analysis and temporal pattern visualization
Implement geospatial data visualization and mapping capabilities
Create automated visualization generation and customization workflows
deliverables: Advanced data visualization platform with multiple chart types
Interactive EDA dashboards with drill-down capabilities
Multi-dimensional and time series visualization workflows
Geospatial data analysis and mapping implementation

sections.title: Feature Analysis and Correlation Studies
topics: Comprehensive feature analysis and relationship identification
Correlation analysis and multicollinearity detection
Feature importance and selection for ML model development
Categorical data analysis and encoding strategy optimization
Feature interaction analysis and polynomial relationship detection

tasks.title: Implement Feature Analysis and Correlation Framework
tasks.description: Build comprehensive feature analysis with ML model guidance
steps: Configure automated feature analysis and relationship identification
Implement correlation analysis and multicollinearity detection
Setup feature importance analysis and selection recommendations
Configure categorical data analysis and encoding optimization
Implement feature interaction analysis and polynomial detection
Create feature analysis reporting and ML model guidance
deliverables: Automated feature analysis and relationship identification
Correlation analysis and multicollinearity detection system
Feature importance and selection recommendation framework
Feature interaction analysis and ML guidance implementation

sections.title: Data Insights and ML Model Guidance
topics: Automated insights generation and data storytelling
ML model recommendation based on data characteristics
Data quality assessment and ML readiness evaluation
Business impact analysis and ROI estimation for ML projects
Stakeholder communication and executive reporting for ML initiatives

tasks.title: Build Data Insights and ML Guidance Platform
tasks.description: Create automated insights with ML model recommendations
steps: Configure automated insights generation and data storytelling
Implement ML model recommendation based on data analysis
Setup data quality assessment and ML readiness evaluation
Configure business impact analysis and ROI estimation workflows
Implement stakeholder communication and executive reporting
Create ML project guidance and recommendation automation
deliverables: Automated insights generation and data storytelling platform
ML model recommendation and guidance system

hands-onExercises.description: Build comprehensive EDA for e-commerce customer behavior and recommendation ML
steps: Analyze customer transaction and behavior datasets with statistical profiling
Create advanced visualizations for customer segmentation and pattern identification
Implement feature analysis for recommendation system model development
Build interactive dashboards for business stakeholder communication
Generate automated insights and ML model recommendations
Test EDA platform with real-world e-commerce datasets and scenarios
hands-onExercises.expectedOutcome: Comprehensive customer behavior EDA platform supporting recommendation system development

hands-onExercises.title: Financial Risk Analytics and Fraud Detection EDA

steps: Analyze financial transaction datasets with advanced statistical methods
Create risk pattern visualization and anomaly detection workflows

hands-onExercises.title: Healthcare Analytics and Predictive Modeling EDA
hands-onExercises.description: Build EDA platform for healthcare data analysis and predictive ML development
steps: Analyze healthcare datasets with privacy-preserving statistical analysis
Create clinical data visualization and outcome pattern identification

hands-onExercises.expectedOutcome: Healthcare EDA platform with clinical insights and predictive modeling guidance

troubleshooting.issue: Large dataset performance issues and memory constraints during statistical analysis
troubleshooting.solution: Implement sampling strategies, use distributed computing frameworks, optimize data formats and partitioning, implement progressive analysis, and use cloud-native scaling

troubleshooting.issue: Complex multivariate relationships and high-dimensional data visualization challenges
troubleshooting.solution: Use dimensionality reduction techniques, implement interactive visualization, create multiple perspective views, use statistical summarization, and implement progressive disclosure

troubleshooting.issue: Statistical significance interpretation and hypothesis testing in ML contexts
troubleshooting.solution: Implement proper statistical testing frameworks, use multiple comparison corrections, provide contextual interpretation, implement confidence intervals, and create statistical literacy resources

Understands multicollinearity detection and feature selection
Can configure feature importance and interaction analysis
Demonstrates ML-guided feature analysis and recommendations
Can generate automated insights and data storytelling
Understands ML model recommendation based on data characteristics
Can assess data quality and ML readiness
Demonstrates business impact analysis and stakeholder communication
